questions.question_text: Tell me about yourself and your background in software development.
What programming languages are you most comfortable with and why?
Describe a challenging project you worked on and how you overcame obstacles.
What is your experience with version control systems like Git?
How do you approach debugging a complex issue in your code?
Tell me about a time when you had to work with a difficult team member. How did you handle it?
What is your experience with databases and SQL?
How do you stay updated with the latest technologies and programming trends?
Describe your experience with testing and quality assurance practices.
Where do you see yourself in your career in the next 5 years?
What is your experience with cloud platforms and deployment?
How would you design a scalable web application architecture?
